pinknodes.title: Pink City
pinknodes.description: The city of Jaipur in India is known as “Pink City” due to the various heritage sites that are built using pink color .

pinknodes.title: Pink Prison
pinknodes.description: The color has also been used on prison walls in order to reduce the erratic behavior of inmates.

pinknodes.title: Pink Pop Star
pinknodes.description: Pink (sometimes known as P!nk), born Alecia Beth Moore, is a famous American singer-songwriter, dancer, and actress from Pennsylvania.
